column6: The truth behind the massive influx of new Powers is revealed, and Deena discovers that a terrible family secret is behind it all. An all-new, explosive chapter of the award-winning cops-and-capes mashup thatâ€™s taken the PlayStation Network by storm! Plus: another exclusive look behind the scenes of the POWERS TV show!
